page.title: 02RICHARD CLARKE FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: {The Richard Clarke First School}was named after a man called Richard Clarke who originated in the village and became a tailor in London in the 1500's.The school we now use was built in 1844 with a new addition in 1970. In the school we have five classes and 120 children. You start at the school at the age of four and leave to go to the Middle school at Uttoxeter at the age of nine. The first playtime is from 10.30 for 15 mins. and then dinner time is at 12.00 when all the children go up the road to the canteen.The last playtime is at 2.20. The Headteacher is Mrs.Pemberton, the Deputy Mrs.Wheeler, the other teachers are Mr.Yeomans,Mrs.Rudd and Mrs.Arthur.
